about_the_game:
Fantastic Far East


This token pack contains 29 tokens. This pack contains a variety of Characters and monsters that can be used in a Far East setting or any Fantasy setting.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Anthro Foo Dog
  • Female Blue Skinned Kensei
  • 2 Female Elven Monks
  • Female Human Kensei
  • Female Human Elemental Monk
  • Female Human Fighter
  • Female Human Warrior
  • 3 Kenkus
  • 3 Living Statues
  • Male Half-Orc Samurai
  • Male Human Archer
  • Male Human Assassin
  • Male Human Heavy Spearman
  • Male Human Heavy Clubber
  • 2 Male Human Monks
  • Male Human Naginata
  • Male Human Spearman
  • Male Human Yojimbo
  • Female Mandragorna
  • Tusked Monster
  • Undead Skeleton
  • 2 Oni

Released on March 31, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
